news.title: He is a human skeleton, Gaza hostage's brother tells BBC
news.summary: Ilay David says the Hamas video showing his brother Evyatar emaciated and weak is a "new form of cruelty" that has left his parents shattered.

news.title: Eurostar passengers face delays and cancellations due to French rail issue
news.summary: Several services between London and Paris have been impacted, as have some trains between Amsterdam and Brussels.

news.title: Could you be owed car finance compensation? Here's how to check
news.summary: A court ruling could lead to millions claiming compensation over being mis-sold car finance deals.

news.title: How an hour at The Oval provided the most dramatic Test finale you could wish for
news.summary: The fifth Test finale between England and India at The Oval was the most intense, dramatic and emotional sport you could see, says chief cricket reporter Stephan Shemilt.

news.title: British couple held in Iran are in country's worst prisons, says son
news.summary: Joe Bennett says Lindsay and Craig Foreman have been held in solitary confinement.

news.title: Liverpool remember Diogo Jota at first Anfield game since his death
news.summary: Liverpool pay tribute to late forward Diogo Jota in their first match at Anfield since his death.

news.title: Farage calls on police to share immigration status of charged suspects
news.summary: The plea comes after two men were charged in connection with the alleged rape of a 12-year-old girl in Warwickshire.

news.title: Dame Stella Rimington, former MI5 director general, dies at 90
news.summary: Dame Stella was the first female director general of the service and the first to be publicly identified.

news.title: Two teenagers detained for torture and killing of cats
news.summary: Two 17-year-olds tortured and cut open the animals, which had been transported in a black bag.

news.title: Calvin Harris shares placenta photos after birth of son
news.summary: The Scottish DJ announces the birth of his son alongside a series of placenta photos.
